divs: Sighting DetailsIt was around 3:30 am i was smoking and watching the stars and planes in the south direction i seen a plane traveling thought the fight lanes than i notice a ball light get really bright as a plane aproch is the plane was travelin eat to west the ball of light had got really bright a than took off to the north it disapeared but then came back to the exact same spot it hoverd there i than disapeared it travel so fast faster then anything i have ever seen i say the it was around 15000 to 20000 ft in the air.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Olive Hill
